news.title: Scientists Name Spiky Sea Snail after Joe Strummer from The Clash
news.summary: Deep sea snails and punk rock? Bet you didn't think it was possible for the two to mix, but scientists have now named a deep sea snail after punk rock icon Joe Strummer.

news.title: 'Punk rock' snail named for the Clash's Joe Strummer
news.summary: Scientists have named a spiky shelled, deep-sea snail after Joe Strummer, the late lead vocalist and guitarist from the famed British punk band the Clash.

news.title: Un escargot nommé Joe Strummer
news.summary: Une nouvelle race d'escargot a été baptisée en hommage au leader du groupe The Clash.

news.title: Joe Strummer has deep sea snail named after him
news.summary: Alviniconcha strummeri live beneath the surface of the ocean and apparently ‘look like punk rockers in the 70s and 80s’ A species of deep sea snail with the bold, spiky aesthetic of early Clash fans has been named after Joe Strummer. Alviniconcha strummeri

news.title: Five New Species of Spiky Sea Snails Discovered, One Named after Joe Strummer
news.summary: A group of marine biologists headed by Dr Robert Vrijenhoek from the Monterey Bay Aquarium Research Institute has described five new species of deep water Alviniconcha snails from the Western Pacific and the Indian Ocean. Snails in the genus Alviniconcha b

Alviniconcha strummeri
Named in honour of Joe Strummer, the lead vocalist and guitarist from The Clash, a British punk band. The name highlights the ‘hardcore’ nature of Alviniconcha snails, that inhabit the hottest, most acidic and most sulphidic microhab

facebook.title: Monterey Bay Aquarium Research Institute (MBARI)
facebook.summary: The most "hardcore" snails in the ocean, Alviniconcha, live in the hottest and most acidic waters around the mouth of chimneys of hydrothermal vents. These snails are so hardcore they barely make shells, however, the shells they do make are covered in spik

facebook.title: Monterey Bay Aquarium Research Institute (MBARI)
facebook.summary: Finally! The genus Alviniconcha is a group of charismatic deep-sea vent gastropods, and has been known to comprise of several cryptic species. Except Alviniconcha hessleri Okutani & Ohta, 1988 all have remained undescribed -- until now!

blogs.title: Meet the Spiky Shelled Sea Snail Named After The Clash's Joe Strummer

wikipedia.title: List of organisms named after famous people
wikipedia.summary: In biological nomenclature, organisms often receive scientific names that honor a person.

wikipedia.title: Alviniconcha
wikipedia.summary: Alviniconcha is a genus of deep water sea snails, marine gastropod mollusks in the family Provannidae.

wikipedia.title: List of gastropods described in 2014
wikipedia.summary: This list of gastropods described in 2014 is a list of new taxa of snails and slugs of every kind that have been described (following the rules of the ICZN) during the year 2014.

wikipedia.title: Scaly-foot gastropod
wikipedia.summary: Chrysomallon squamiferum, common name the scaly-foot gastropod, is a species of deep-sea hydrothermal vent snail, a marine gastropod mollusc in the family Peltospiridae.
